nodes.text: Riding Ham was a type of food that could be purchased on the planet of Lothal. In the year 5 BBY the Twi'lek pilot Hera Syndulla included riding ham on a shopping list of supplies needed by the crew of her VCX-100 light freighter the Ghost. She gave the list to Ezra Bridger and Garazeb Orrelios—two of her crewmates—who then traveled to the settlement of Kothal to purchase the items on the list. Orrelios managed to locate and purchase the riding ham and every other item on the list bar a Meiloorun, which the pair attempted to steal from the Galactic Empire.
